contents: Article 18 (Executives) ① Member sports organizations shall have the following executives. Revised 2021. 10. 6. 1. 1 Chairman Revised 2020. 7. 29. 2. No more than 7 Vice Presidents (including at least one person each representing professional sports, recreational sports, regional sports, and women's sports) Revised 2018. 4. 25., 2019. 12. 20. 3. 15 to 29 directors (including the chairman and vice-chairman) 4. 2 auditors ② The number of executives specified in paragraph 1, item 3 shall be 10 by resolution of the general meeting of the member sports organizations. The number of members may be increased within the range of no more than 100 people. (Limited to directors) Newly established on August 7, 2017, October 6, 2021. ③ Executives of member sport organizations cannot concurrently hold the position of other executives in the member sport organization. . Revised 2017. 8. 7., 2018. 4. 25. ④ Executives cannot act as registered athletes, but this may be changed upon resolution at the general meeting of the member sports organization. Newly established 2018. 4. 25., 2021. 10. 6.
